nodes.title: Oil & Gas
nodes.short_description: Primary economic driver; hydrocarbon rents shape politics, alliances, and conflicts across the region.

nodes.title: United States
nodes.short_description: Security guarantor, military presence, sanctions and diplomacy shaping regional balances and conflicts.

nodes.title: Saudi Arabia
nodes.short_description: Largest oil exporter; leads OPEC, regional diplomacy, and invests heavily, influencing markets and geopolitics.

nodes.title: Iran
nodes.short_description: Regional power with proxy networks; nuclear program and sanctions drive conflicts, alignments, and economic strain.

nodes.title: Israel
nodes.short_description: Military power; conflict dynamics, technology sector, and regional normalization reshape security and economics.

nodes.title: OPEC production quotas
nodes.short_description: Coordinated output limits by member states set supply, revenues, and global prices affecting regional economies.

nodes.title: U.S. sanctions on Iran
nodes.short_description: Restrict Iranian oil, finance, and trade, altering regional power dynamics and economic flows.

nodes.title: Syrian Civil War
nodes.short_description: Protracted conflict drawing regional and global actors, refugee flows, militias, and territorial control shifts.

nodes.title: 2023 Israel-Hamas war
nodes.short_description: Escalated conflict reshaping regional alignments, security postures, energy and shipping risk premia.

nodes.title: Saudi Aramco
nodes.short_description: State oil giant; pricing, investment, and capacity decisions move global markets and regional revenues.

nodes.title: Mohammed bin Salman
nodes.short_description: Saudi crown prince steering oil policy, Vision 2030, and regional diplomacy and security strategies.

nodes.title: Ali Khamenei
nodes.short_description: Iran's Supreme Leader directing foreign policy, nuclear posture, and regional proxy activities.

nodes.title: United Arab Emirates
nodes.short_description: Financial hub, energy producer, and assertive regional actor influencing trade, investment, and conflicts.

nodes.title: Defense & Arms
nodes.short_description: High defense spending, arms sales, and domestic production shape security balances and conflict intensity.

nodes.title: Suez Canal transit services
nodes.short_description: Critical shipping route; tolls and closures affect trade, energy flows, and regional revenues.
